statements: SELECT * FROM plastic_products;
SELECT product_name, sale_price FROM plastic_products WHERE product_type='Cups';
SELECT product_id, retailer_name FROM plastic_products ORDER BY retailer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM plastic_products WHERE sale_price > 100 ORDER BY sale_price ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_type FROM plastic_products WHERE retailer_name='Walmart';
SELECT * FROM plastic_products ORDER BY product_name DESC, sale_price ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, sale_price FROM plastic_products WHERE product_type = 'utensils';
SELECT * FROM plastic_products WHERE retailer_name = 'ABC Retailers' AND sale_price > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT product_type FROM plastic_products;
SELECT product_name, sale_price FROM plastic_products WHERE sale_price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY sale_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM plastic_products;
SELECT product_name, price, plastic_type FROM plastic_products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT retailer_name, location FROM retailer WHERE total_sales < 10000.00 ORDER BY retailer_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, plastic_type, price FROM plastic_products WHERE retailer_id = 1;
SELECT retailer_name, total_sales FROM retailer WHERE total_sales > 50000.00 ORDER BY total_sales DESC, retailer_name;
SELECT * FROM retailer WHERE total_sales > 50000;
SELECT product_name, price FROM plastic_products WHERE plastic_type = 'BPA-free' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT retailer_name, location, total_sales FROM retailer ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT product_name, retailer_name, price FROM plastic_products p JOIN retailer r ON p.retailer_id = r.retailer_id;
SELECT retailer_id, AVG(total_sales) as avg_sales FROM retailer GROUP BY retailer_id HAVING AVG(total_sales) > 10000;
SELECT * FROM PlasticProducts;
SELECT product_name, product_type FROM PlasticProducts WHERE retailer_id = 1;
SELECT retailer_name, location FROM Retailers ORDER BY retailer_name DESC;
SELECT sale_date, quantity_sold FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, retailer_name, sale_amount FROM PlasticProducts JOIN Retailers ON PlasticProducts.retailer_id = Retailers.retailer_id;
SELECT * FROM PlasticProducts;
SELECT product_name, product_type FROM PlasticProducts ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;

SELECT p.product_name, r.retailer_name, s.quantity_sold FROM PlasticProducts p INNER JOIN Retailers r ON p.retailer_id = r.retailer_id INNER JOIN Sales s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE r.location = 'New York';
SELECT AVG(sale_amount) AS average_sale_amount, MAX(quantity_sold) AS max_quantity_sold FROM Sales;
SELECT * FROM plastic_products;
SELECT product_name, plastic_type FROM plastic_products WHERE retailer_id = 1;
SELECT retailer_name, location FROM retailers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT sale_date, product_id, retailer_id FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, retailer_name, sale_date FROM plastic_products INNER JOIN sales ON plastic_products.product_id = sales.product_id;
SELECT * FROM plastic_products WHERE plastic_type = 'Polyethylene';
SELECT product_name, retailer_name, location FROM plastic_products INNER JOIN retailers ON plastic_products.retailer_id = retailers.retailer_id;
SELECT product_name, pollution_level, pollution_date FROM plastic_products INNER JOIN pollution_data ON plastic_products.product_id = pollution_data.product_id WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT product_name, sale_date FROM plastic_products JOIN sales ON plastic_products.product_id = sales.product_id ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT retailer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM retailers JOIN sales ON retailers.retailer_id = sales.retailer_id GROUP BY retailer_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM plastic_products;
SELECT product_name, selling_price FROM plastic_products WHERE plastic_type='PET';
SELECT product_name, retailer_name, location FROM plastic_products JOIN retailers ON plastic_products.retailer_id = retailers.retailer_id;
SELECT product_id, plastic_type, selling_price FROM plastic_products ORDER BY selling_price DESC;
SELECT item_name, pollution_level FROM polluted_items WHERE pollution_level='High' ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM plastic_products WHERE selling_price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, retailer_name FROM plastic_products JOIN retailers ON plastic_products.retailer_id = retailers.retailer_id;
SELECT product_name, plastic_type, selling_price FROM plastic_products WHERE plastic_type = 'PET' AND selling_price < 20;
SELECT retailer_name, location, contact_number FROM retailers WHERE retailer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY location;
SELECT p.product_name, s.sale_date, s.quantity, s.total_amount FROM sales s JOIN plastic_products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id WHERE s.quantity >= 10 ORDER BY s.sale_date DESC;
